name: Dodge The Blox!
description:
This is my first game ever created and the first build I made entirley by following a tutorial by a youtuber known as Brackeys. I am only uploading this because I plan on changing a ton of things in this game and maybe even making some secret areas... but more on that in a future update. I hope you enjoy my game and make sure to check back frequently for updates as there will be many to come!

Known Bugs:

-Sometimes after you fall off map your screen will display the word "nan" and you won't be able to respawn. A quick restart of the game should fix this bug.

IF YOU FIND ANY BUGS NOT ALREADY LISTED BE SURE TO TELL ME ABOUT THEM IN THE COMMENTS BELOW!
